    What is the benefit of Full Arch Implants?

    Immediate function

    The process of dental implants can take weeks. Eating, speaking, or even just laughing with friends can become a challenge, you just want your smile back without any delay.

    With Smile in a Day implants, you dont have to wait. The temporary prosthetic teeth are installed on the same day as the implant surgery, meaning you can leave the dental office with a full set of brand new teeth.

    Cost-effective

    You will no longer have to sacrifice your dental health because of prohibitive costs. Because the procedure uses fewer implants and can often avoid the need for bone grafting, it can be more affordable for many patients.

    Full-arch rehabilitation

    Its frustrating to feel limited by something that should be simple and natural, like smiling or enjoying your favourite foods.

    We provide a comprehensive solution designed specifically for people like you, who have lost most or all of their teeth. With our Full-Arch Rehabilitation, youll regain your confidence, reclaim your smile, and return to a life unhindered by tooth loss.

    Preserve the bone structure of your jaw

    With each lost tooth, the bone that once supported it begins to erode, affecting your overall oral health and changing the shape of your face.

    Our implants come with titanium screws that are placed directly into the jawbone, mimicking the function of natural tooth roots. This helps to keep your jaw strong.

    Why choose Lifestyle Dental for your treatment?

    • Tailored expert care: Our team of specialists provides focused, expert care at every stage of your procedure.
    • Soothing atmosphere: Step into our clinic and let us take care of you while you unwind and look forward to your new smile.
    • One-stop solution: Save time with our comprehensive services. Say goodbye to the hassle of multiple appointments at different locations and enjoy seamless care in one place.
    • Comprehensive after-care: Our therapists, Hannah and Jade, provide you with a dedicated after-care service, ensuring your recovery is smooth and answering any questions you may have.
    Arrange my consultation

    What happens during your treatment?

    Full arch implants for only 12,900 or 260 pcm over 60 months using our finance package

    It takes just 3 months to transform your smile and regain your confidence.

    Initial Examination and planning

    Our dental professionals conduct a comprehensive clinical examination to assess your oral and general health. If the procedure is suitable for you, well explain the process in detail to ensure you understand what to expect.

    Using state-of-the-art technology, including CT and intra-oral scanners, we will plan your treatment meticulously. These digital tools help us create a precise map of your mouth, ensuring the optimal placement of your implants.

    Surgical day

    On your appointment day, our dedicated team will place your implants and secure a provisional bridge to them, all on the same day. The practice will be fully dedicated to your care, ensuring a smooth and comfortable experience.

    Three-month follow-up

    Three months after the surgery, well begin the process of replacing your provisional bridge with a final one. This typically involves three appointments. The final bridge is designed to be more durable and natural-looking, enhancing both your smile and oral function.

    Meet our Smile in a Day Team

    Our Smile in a Day team is a carefully selected group of experienced professionals, each dedicated to providing you with the best possible care.

    Jenna

    Your go-to for scheduling and answering any questions related to your Smile in a Day treatment.

    Nadim

    Our dedicated and experienced implant surgeon. With Nadim, youre in skilled hands throughout your procedure.

    Ramin

    As a Certified Dental Technician, Ramin expertly fits your customised bridge on the day of the surgery, ensuring comfort and a natural look.

    Beatrix

    Assisting during your surgery, Beatrixs attention to detail and calming presence provide an added layer of reassurance.

    Naomi

    As our implant nurse, Naomis expertise adds an extra layer of care during your surgery, ensuring a smooth and comfortable experience.
